name: A Bellyful of Blade
description:
A Bellyful of Blade

Game 7 of 12 in a weekly game challenge

Two samurais square up to be the best. A test of speed... reflex... and mastery. The samurai to walk away from this duel will be crowned the strongest samurai in all the land.

Sorry but this is only a two player game and you will need a friend to play with or your other hand.

HOW TO PLAY:

As the samurais charge at each other when the screen flashes and swords clash, be the first samurai to finish the attack.

CONTROLS:

W : Blue samurai attack

P : Black samurai attack
